    Creates a bounding area from a center and half the area's extent.
    static Bounds2 Bounds2.fromPoints​(Vec2[] points, Bounds2 target)
    Sets a bounding volume to encompass an array of points.

    Grows this bounds so as to include a point.

    Scales a bounding area from its center.

    Sets the components of this bounding area with scalars.

    Sets the components of this bounding area.

    Sets this bounds to the components of a source bounds.

    Sets the components of this bounding area.
    Bounds2 Bounds2.shrink​(Vec2 v)
    Shrinks this bounds so as to exclude a point.

    Shrinks this bounds so as to exclude a point.
    Bounds2 Bounds2.translate​(Vec2 v)
    Translates this bounds by a vector.
    static Bounds2 Bounds2.unitSquareSigned​(Bounds2 target)
    Returns a boundary encompassing a signed unit square in the range [-1.0, 1.0] .
    static Bounds2 Bounds2.unitSquareUnsigned​(Bounds2 target)
    Returns a boundary encompassing an unsigned unit square in the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    Bounds2 Bounds2.verify()
    Verifies that all components of minimum are less than those of the maximum, and that the minimums and maximums do not equal each other.

    Finds the center of a bounding box.

    Compares two bounds according to their center points.
    static boolean Bounds2.contains​(Bounds2 b, Vec2 v)
    Evaluates whether a point is within the bounding area, lower bounds inclusive, upper bounds exclusive.
    static Vec2 Bounds2.contains​(Bounds2 b, Vec2 v, Vec2 target)
    Evaluates whether a point is within the bounding area, lower bounds inclusive upper bounds exclusive.
    static boolean Bounds2.containsExclusive​(Bounds2 b, Vec2 v)
    Evaluates whether a point is within the bounding area, excluding the bound's edges (i.e., the evaluation is made with greater than and less than).
    static Vec2 Bounds2.containsExclusive​(Bounds2 b, Vec2 v, Vec2 target)
    Evaluates whether a point is within the bounding area, excluding the bound's edges (i.e., the evaluation is made with greater than and less than).

    A boolean vector is returned; useful for cases where a point may be contained in one dimension but not in another.
    static boolean Bounds2.containsInclusive​(Bounds2 b, Vec2 v)
    Evaluates whether a point is within the bounding area, including the bound's edges (i.e., the evaluation is made with greater than or equal to and less than or equal to).
    static Vec2 Bounds2.containsInclusive​(Bounds2 b, Vec2 v, Vec2 target)
    Evaluates whether a point is within the bounding area, including the bound's edges (i.e., the evaluation is made with greater than or equal to and less than or equal to).

    A boolean vector is returned; useful for cases where a point may be contained in one dimension but not in another.
    static Vec2 Bounds2.extent​(Bounds2 b, Vec2 target)
    Finds the extent of the bounds, the absolute difference between its minimum and maximum corners.
    static Bounds2 Bounds2.fromCenterExtent​(Vec2 center, Vec2 extent, Bounds2 target)
    Creates a bounding area from a center and the area's extent.
    static Bounds2 Bounds2.fromCenterHalfExtent​(Vec2 center, Vec2 he, Bounds2 target)
    Creates a bounding area from a center and half the area's extent.
    static Bounds2 Bounds2.fromPoints​(Vec2[] points, Bounds2 target)

    static Vec2 Bounds2.halfExtent​(Bounds2 b, Vec2 target)
    Finds half the extent of the bounds.
    static boolean Bounds2.intersect​(Bounds2 a, Bounds2 b)
    Evaluates whether two bounding areas intersect.
    static Vec2 Bounds2.intersect​(Bounds2 a, Bounds2 b, Vec2 target)
    Evaluates whether two bounding areas intersect.
    static boolean Bounds2.intersect​(Bounds2 a, Vec2 center, float radius)
    Evaluates whether a bounding area intersects a circle.
    Vec2[] Quadtree.queryRange​(Bounds2 range)
    Queries the quadtree with a rectangular range, returning points inside the range.

    Sets this bounds to the components of a source bounds.
    static void Bounds2.split​(Bounds2 b, float xFac, float yFac, Bounds2 sw, Bounds2 se, Bounds2 nw, Bounds2 ne)
    Splits a bounding area into four quadrants according to two factors in [0.0, 1.0] .
    static void Bounds2.split​(Bounds2 b, Bounds2 sw, Bounds2 se, Bounds2 nw, Bounds2 ne)
    Splits a bounding area into quadrants.
    static boolean Bounds2.split​(Bounds2 b, Vec2 v, Bounds2 sw, Bounds2 se, Bounds2 nw, Bounds2 ne)
    Splits a bounding area into four quadrants according to a point.
